meanings.definition: Moving with quick, small movements from side to side
meanings.sent1: The puppy was the wiggliest in the litter, always wagging its tail excitedly.
meanings.sent2: The snake slithered in the wiggliest way possible, making it hard to catch.
meanings.sent3: The wiggliest squirrel in the park entertained everyone with its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was the wiggliest of them all, captivating the audience with her fluid movements.
meanings.sent5: The wiggliest branches of the tree swayed gently in the breeze, like dancers in the wind.

meanings.definition: Having the most wiggly or flexible quality
meanings.sent1: The rubber band was the wiggliest of them all, stretching easily around objects.
meanings.sent2: The octopus showed off its wiggliest tentacles as it moved gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent3: The wiggliest toy in the box was the favorite among the children, bending and twisting in fun ways.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was the wiggliest, coming up with the most creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The wiggliest rope in the gym class was perfect for climbing, flexing to support each student's weight.
